title: Alert
description: Alert Information description properties of this notice

alert_datetime.description: Date and time of notice creation [UTC, ISO 8601], ex YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.ssssssZ

alert_tense.description: Indication of whether this alert refers to a recent observation (current), re-analysis of archival data (archival), a planned observation in the future (planned), a signal injection (injection), commanded trigger (commanded) or a test trigger (test).

alert_type.description: Indication of alert sequence if multiple of same type sent
